issue.title: Unable to open wallet UI with ubuntu 23.10
issue.body:
### Is there an existing issue for this?

- [X] I have searched the existing issues

### Current behaviour

Hello, 
I noticed that the UI does not open.


### Expected behaviour

to open the UI

### Steps to reproduce

I copy past the command of the shortcut 
`env BAMF_DESKTOP_FILE_HINT=/var/lib/snapd/desktop/applications/bitcoin-core_bitcoin-qt.desktop /snap/bin/bitcoin-core.qt %u`
in a terminal 

The terminal output of the command line
`Fontconfig warning: FcPattern object weight does not accept value [0 205)
[1]    824648 segmentation fault (core dumped)  env  /snap/bin/bitcoin-core.qt %u`


I installed Bitcoin Core with Snap this summer. 
Then, I upgraded the system from Ubuntu 23.04 to 23.10 
I have not open Bitcoin Core since the upgrade 

Also I follow this https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/doc/build-unix.md#dependency-build-instructions
And install every dependency I see in this page 



### Relevant log output

_No response_

### How did you obtain Bitcoin Core

Package manager

### What version of Bitcoin Core are you using?

v26.0.0

### Operating system and version

Ubuntu 23.10

### Machine specifications

Asus laptop Zenbook
